ai-tha-ap112:2.1_0: by a disciple of the supreme disciple,
ai-tha-ap112:2.2_0: I recommended myself in the woods.
ai-tha-ap112:2.4_0: I was conceived in the womb.
ai-tha-ap112:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap112:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap112:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Revata.
ai-tha-ap112:7.1_0: Reṇu the senior monks who had gone forth.
ai-tha-ap112:8.1_0: The eleventh sub-chapter on alms is finished.
ai-tha-ap112:10.1_0: A monk gives knowledge, and perceiving the knowledge of the spiritual life.
